response.job_title: Operational Excellence, Logistics, Supply Chain, Planning, Strategy, Green Logistics, Sustainability
response.summary:
I am a passionate logistic & supply chain professional with +5 years of experience managing improvement initiatives with cross-functional and multicultural teams to deliver sustainable results end to end. 

Skills and Competencies: Operational Excellence, Logistics & Supply Chain, Continuous Improvement, Green Logistics, Sustainability, Digitalization, Network Design, Data Analysis, Strategic Thinking, Planning, Rapid Learning, Adaptability, and Flexibility.
response.skills: Six Sigma, Operational Excellence, Process Improvement, Supply Chain Management, Microsoft Office, TPM

profile_positions.description:
•	Lead cross-functional and multicultural teams on operational excellence, network redesign, and best practice-sharing initiatives, improving efficiency in the operations and delivering savings above USD$5MM per year.
•	Monitor the correct planning and execution of the LATAM region logistic Budget (OPEX & CAPEX).
•	Design the logistics global vision, to guarantee its sustainability with a team of worldwide experts.
profile_positions.title: Operational Excellence Leader for Logistics and Supply Chain LATAM

profile_positions.description:
•	Redesigned the monitoring of technological initiatives that improve the efficiency of logistics processes in the region, guaranteeing prioritization and timeliness execution.
•	Collaborated in the design of the S&OP regional process, guaranteeing timely decision-making by the board of directors.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Specialist LATAM

profile_positions.description:
•	Generated initiatives with potential savings in operating expenses of between 5% and 10%.
•	Improved fill rate compliance for domestic distribution by 24% vs 2018.
profile_positions.title: Domestic Distribution Specialist

profile_positions.description: •	Improved efficiency for domestic distribution operation by up to 98% and consolidated expense/sales ratio below 3%.
profile_positions.title: Domestic Distribution Sr. Analyst

profile_positions.description: •	Designed process improvement and network re-design projects for the logistics operations in Colombia and Mexico, generating sustainable efficiencies over time.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Trainee

profile_positions.description:
•	Facilitated the implementation of the 5'S' program, achieving 96% compliance in external audits.
•	Reduced raw material losses by over 5% through continuous improvement cycle analysis.
profile_positions.title: Industrial Engineer Trainee - TPM

company.name: Bridgestone Americas
company.description:
Nashville, Tennessee-based Bridgestone Americas, Inc. is a subsidiary of Bridgestone Corporation, a global leader providing sustainable mobility and advanced solutions. Bridgestone develops, manufactures and markets a diverse portfolio of original equipment and replacement tires, tire-centric solutions, mobility solutions and other rubber-associated and diversified products that deliver social and customer value. These best-in-class offerings are sold to consumers and fleet customers around the world under the trusted Bridgestone and Firestone brand names.

With more than 50 production facilities and 55,000 employees, the Bridgestone Americas enterprise spans from Canada to Argentina. Business units of Bridgestone Americas include Bridgestone Retail Operations, the world’s largest network of company-owned retail tire and automotive service centers; Bandag, a leader in commercial tire retreading worldwide; Firestone Building Products, an industry leader in commercial roofing and building solutions; and Firestone Industrial Products, a leading provider of technologically advanced air springs for commercial and passenger vehicle applications. 
 
Across all its businesses, Bridgestone is dedicated to shaping a sustainable future. Guided by its global corporate social responsibility commitment, Our Way to Serve, the company strives to improve the way people around the world move, live, work and play in every aspect of its business. 

To view our terms of use, visit https://www.bridgestoneamericas.com/en/terms-of-use.
